Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that Anonymous seized the domain of the white supremacist site Daily Stormer.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the post claiming the domain seizure was made by Anonymous, despite skepticism from the @YourAnonNews Twitter account.
Exist alternative explanation: The @YourAnonNews Twitter account suggests that the claim could be a stunt by The Daily Stormer itself or that they may be having difficulty finding a new host.
Understate: The claim may understate the skepticism expressed by the @YourAnonNews Twitter account regarding the involvement of Anonymous in the domain seizure.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that GoDaddy announced it would no longer host The Daily Stormer due to a violation of their terms of service, rather than the domain being seized by Anonymous.
